job_purpose: To design and develop high-quality code, collaborate with teams to meet client/business needs, optimize code performance, and communicate technical concepts in a rapidly growing software company focused on data science and machine learning.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design and develop high-quality code to bring complex system designs to life
Collaborate with other teams to develop robust software meeting client/business needs
Refine and optimize code to enhance performance and scalability
Navigate dynamic frameworks to drive structured progress
Communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
required_qualifications: 2-5 years of previous Software Developer experience
BSc (or higher) in Computer Science / Software Engineering or proven track record of full-stack software development
Full stack experience involving Java and front-end development within a modern web framework
Demonstrated capability in delivering simple solutions to complex problems
company_details: Ox Mountain Limited revolutionizes how large industrial organizations operate by leveraging data science and machine learning. The company empowers individuals with actionable insights to drive improvements in safety, reliability, and productivity while supporting sustainable development and the UN Sustainable Development Goals. With a world-class team culture, Ox Mountain Limited offers a unique opportunity to be part of a technological advance that is transforming the industry.
